name: Dicephemy
description:
A short action game revolving around a die trying to evade their enemies. It should take from 5 to 10 minutes to finish. THERE IS AN ENDING SO DON'T CLOSE THE GAME JUST YET Controls:

Hold WASD to move.

Credits:

Music

  1. Mid-Air Machine - Guardians
  2. Mid-Air Machine - Our Giant's Alone
  3. Mid-Air Machine - Remember the Way
  4. Mid-Air Machine - Streets of Sant'Ivo
  5. Mid-Air Machine - Land of a Folk Divided
  6. Mid-Air Machine - Powerless

Assets

  1. Armor and Rum - Dice d6 game ready PBR
  2. Hovl Studio - Procedural fire

Fonts

  1. Riciery Leal - VCR OSD Mono

Post-processing Effects

  1. keijiro - KinoGlitch
  2. Garrett Gunnelll - Post Processing Pipeline For Unity
  3. Garret Gunnell - CRT Shader
